title: 22 New Technology Trends for 2024: New Tech Horizons
content: After mastering generative AI, individuals can pursue exciting job roles in fields such as artificial intelligence research, data science, and creative industries. At the same time, we have 5G already; gear up for an era of 6G with more power in our hands and devices surrounding us. Smarter devices are another addition to the IT industry that is of high requirement and demand as more companies transform into digital spaces. With AI spreading its wings across sectors, new jobs will be created in development, programming, testing, support and maintenance, to name a few. 5G Network subscriptions will reach 4.4 billion by the end of 2027, making it an emerging technology trend you must watch out for, and also save a spot in.

title: Ramakrishna Mission President Swami Smaranananda Dies At 94, PM Modi Expresses Grief - News18
content: HomeMoviesCricketIndiaShowshaPoliticsWorldViralBusinessOpinionEducationWeb StoriesVideos Home Movies Cricket India Showsha Politics World Viral Business Opinion Education Web Stories Videos HomeMoviesCricketIndiaShowshaPoliticsWorldViralBusinessOpinionEducationWeb StoriesVideosPhotosExplainersTechAutoLifestyleHealthTravelFoodSportsMarketsTaxSavings and InvestmentsBreaking NewsCity NewsPower CircuitElectionsAstrologyViralBollywoodRegional CinemaTelevisionWeb SeriesStudio18 Home Movies Cricket India Showsha Politics World Viral Business Opinion Education Web Stories Videos Photos Explainers Tech Auto Lifestyle Health Travel Food Sports Markets Tax Savings and Investments Breaking News City News Power Circuit Elections Astrology Viral Bollywood Regional Cinema Television Web Series Studio18 LatestIPL 2024ElectionsBoard Exam ResultsIPL ScheduleLifestyleMovie ReviewsExplainersPhotosSportsTechAuto Latest IPL 2024 Elections Board Exam Results IPL Schedule Lifestyle Movie Reviews Explainers Photos Sports Tech Auto Ramakrishna Mission President Swami Smaranananda Dies At 94, PM Modi Expresses Grief Curated By: Pragati Pal News18.com Last Updated: 26, 2024, New Delhi, India PM Modi recalled his interaction with Swami Smaranananda ji Maharaj, who had dedicated his life to spirituality and service during his visit to the Belur math in 2020. (Image/X/@narendramodi) Prime Minister Narendra Modi paid condolences on the demise of Swami Smaranananda ji Maharaj and said he left an "indelible mark" on countless hearts and minds Follow us:WhatsappFacebookTwitterTelegramGoogle News Follow us:WhatsappFacebookTwitterTelegramGoogle News Swami Smaranananda ji Maharaj, the revered President of Ramakrishna Math and Ramakrishna Mission died on at , the mission said in a statement. His compassion and wisdom will continue to inspire generations.I had… pic.twitter.com/lK1mYKbKQt — Narendra Modi (@narendramodi) 26, 2024 “I had a very close relation with him over the years. A few weeks ago in Kolkata, I had also visited the hospital and enquired about his health. My condolences are with his countless followers,” the Home Minister said in an X post.
